stat1.text: Of all sick leave in Germany was due to back pain alone in 2024.

stat3.text: Workdays per year are lost due to back related illnesses in Munich in 2024. Or 8.510 years.

stat6.text: Per year — that's the average cost of an employee's lack of productivity due to pain.

mission.title: OUR MISSION
mission.paragraph1: Is creating a healthier society throughout every aspect of life: Personal and Business. We do that by delivering a higher standard in personal training experiences.
mission.paragraph2: Is blending innovative sport science with proven training methods, while providing your team members the space where they can live your company culture.
